description: Judging from the news about the likely impact of global warming, the world that will take shape in the course of this century will be decidedly more watery than we're comfortable with. The polar ice caps are melting, glaciers are retreating, ocean levels are rising at increasing rates, polar bear habitat is disappearing, and countries are already jockeying for control over a new arctic passage.
name: LOOKING FOR LOLA: The Allure of a Cinematic Name
